message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.CR 

This paper is about person re-identification, which is a computer vision task. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper proposes a novel method that integrates a relative local distance constraint into convolutional neural networks (CNNs) to improve the performance of person re-ID. This involves learning a structure-aware feature representation, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper uses deep neural networks, which is a subfield of multimedia (cs.MM). The method also involves regularization, which is a common technique in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper deals with the problem of imperfect person detectors, which is a security issue and falls under the category of cryptography and security (cs.CR).
